name: Omastar BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Dangerous Tentacles
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon-EX with his or her Active Pokémon.

rule_box: Omastar BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
